description: This table displays the SmartTexts that are associated with intervention (LPI) records.

columns.name: INTERVENTION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the intervention record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SMARTTEXTS_ID_SMARTTEXT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the SmartText record.

columns.name: IP_INV_LDS_ID
columns.description: Inpatient intervention discipline associated with this SmartText.

columns.name: IP_INV_LDS_ID_DISC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the discipline record.

columns.name: HH_INT_DISC_C_NAME
columns.description:
Home Health discipline for intervention


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
